entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is mentioned as the one who spoke to Harry about Dumbledore being in the house.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as eating a potato with his fork.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as dropping his eyes to his plate and thinking about Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as being in the house on the eve of Harry's hearing.

relationships.description: Harry thought about Dumbledore and felt worse because he didn't ask to see him.
Mr. Weasley mentioned Dumbledore being in the house.
